items.text: Write tons of shell & ruby scripts. Make it eaiser to setup the project and generate native code that make it safter to call apart from hard code. Write CLI to maintain them to reduce the complexity of scripts management

Componentization related development. Seperate different business to different Pods/Development Pods. Rewrite the middleware native code generator which different component can depend on it and call methods from it to make use of other components but they don't have to depend on each other
Reduce the compile time of the project (Private CocoaPods Spec/compiled binary/CocoaPods patch)

Use gitlab-runner to run CI jobs and integrate swiftlint/oclint/danger

IM & music player releated business requirements development
Analyze Development Pods' dependencies in CocoaPods projects, written in electron
